etymology.description: Depicts a half of a tree trunk resembling a bed frame
etymology.interpretation: The character 爿(爿) (pán, 'bed') originally depicted a vertical half of a split tree trunk, representing the wooden structure akin to a bed or bed frame.

examples.chinese: 我睡在柔软的爿上(我睡在柔軟的爿上)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ shuì zài róuruǎn de pán shàng.
examples.english: I sleep on a soft bed.

examples.chinese: 昨晚我躺在硬爿上(昨晚我躺在硬爿上)，感受夜的宁静(感受夜的寧靜)。
examples.pinyin: Zuówǎn wǒ tǎng zài yìng pán shàng, gǎnshòu yè de níngjìng.
examples.english: Last night I lay on a hard bed, feeling the tranquility of the night.
